Template: Event rates adjusted for patient-years

Source: R/tm_t_events_patyear.R
template_events_patyear.Rd

Template: Event rates adjusted for patient-years

template_events_patyear(
  dataname,
  parentname,
  arm_var,
  events_var,
  aval_var = "AVAL",
  add_total = TRUE,
  control = control_incidence_rate(),
  drop_arm_levels = TRUE
)

Arguments

dataname

(character)
analysis data used in teal module.
parentname

(character)
parent analysis data used in teal module, usually this refers to ADSL.
arm_var

(character)
variable names that can be used as arm_var.
events_var

(integer)
number of observed events.
aval_var

(character)
name of the analysis variable.
add_total

(logical)
whether to include column with total number of patients.
control

(list)
list of settings for the analysis.
drop_arm_levels

(logical)
drop the unused arm_var levels. When TRUE, arm_var levels are set to those used in the dataname dataset. When FALSE, arm_var levels are set to those used in the parantname dataset.

See also

tm_t_events_patyear()
